title: 2017 Worlds Missions
body: I haven't gotten new missions for about 4 days. I completed these missions like a week ago yet the new missions aren't out....

replies.body: We should all be getting more missions as Worlds progresses, but it looks like we might not get the second set until next week.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=NsIH9yix,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-28T01:30:42.157+0000)
>
> We should all be getting more missions as Worlds progresses, but it looks like we might not get the second set until next week.

At this point in time, its been more than a week since the week 1 missions came out so I would like to ask if there is/was  _supposed_ to be a specific day/time for each week we were to expect the mission list to update, but , as you said, "we might not get the second set until next week", there is actually a bug with the missions or the update hasn't been rolled out yet? I mean a while back, league use to always update on Tuesdays or something and it was good to know which day the new updates always came out.
Finally got the details boys! Looks like we'll be getting the next set of missions on Oct 2!
Nice ! Out of interest how come the missions are late ?

They weren't exactly 'late', it's just the first set of missions were scheduled to last 2 weeks long. The second set was scheduled for Oct 2, they just hadn't told anyone until 3 days ago for some weird reason xD

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=NsIH9yix,comment-id=00000000000000010000,timestamp=2017-10-01T20:30:33.642+0000)
>
> They weren't exactly 'late', it's just the first set of missions were scheduled to last 2 weeks long. The second set was scheduled for Oct 2, they just hadn't told anyone until 3 days ago for some weird reason xD

well the 2nd has come and still no missions, interesting, don`t understand what is the weird reasoning behind could be??? interesting...i bet that the reasoning  was "marketing" so more and more people would buy the pass for their missions in a sensible rush ...p.s. if u pointed out the date please do tell us the hour or hours in witch the missions should appear.
maybe wait? the 2nd still is not over, and the event missions usually come out, at 19:00 GMT so still a few hours left....
finally a well rounded response an hour has been set thank you very much
done them in like 3 games i can print to proof...and with master pass active ...how long before the other ones come out?:D
Got 'em yet? Oct 2nd hasn't ended, so it's jumping the gun a little to assume there's a problem. You should have them now, and if not try refreshing your client. Little patience goes a long way ^_^
sorry if my English is not that good, but i meant i got the missions yesterday and finished them in like 3 matches and i was wondering when are the 3rd set of missions coming :D
They *should* be weekly now. The date I'm seeing listed right now is Oct 9th 11:00 AM (not entirely sure atm if this is local time or PST)

Thank You! Took awhile to find this thread, maybe making a schedule post for the missions and putting it on the main news page or something would be best. It's only 6am PST right now so I'm hoping the missions are released soon. Thanks again for the info! Looking forward to the missions! I think missions are a WONDERFUL addition to the game(Except those SG ones...) and it gives me more to do and some mini goals to achieve. Keep up the great work Riot!

> [{quoted}](name=Valkraz,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=NsIH9yix,comment-id=0000000000000003,timestamp=2017-10-02T13:16:06.572+0000)
>
> Thank You! Took awhile to find this thread, maybe making a schedule post for the missions and putting it on the main news page or something would be best. It's only 6am PST right now so I'm hoping the missions are released soon. Thanks again for the info! Looking forward to the missions! I think missions are a WONDERFUL addition to the game(Except those SG ones...) and it gives me more to do and some mini goals to achieve. Keep up the great work Riot!

Yeah, I am with you on that schedule idea. I got the pass as soon as it was available and now have been basically waiting for over a week to get any missions whatsoever after completing week 1. 

Agreed, those Star Guardian missions were pure pain to do.... There simply was no fun in trying to get them all... but most of that came from the mode itself being pretty annoying to play and having to fulfill some other requirements made that feel grindy as hell.
It's the 2nd Oct and I still don't have missions. Will they be available later on in the day?
how u need to get that icon that u have@ninja499{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}
The first mission is the one that gives you the icon, but you don't seem to need it as you already have a worlds icon.
